trans-unit.source: The result of evaluating all authorization policies available from the tokens in the sent message and by calling the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager.GetAuthorizationPolicies*> method.
trans-unit.target: Resultatet av evaluering av alle authorization-policyer som er tilgjengelig fra token i den sendte meldingen, og ved å kalle den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager.GetAuthorizationPolicies*>metoden.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager.GetAuthorizationPolicies*>

trans-unit.source: Evaluating all of the authorization policies in an authorization manager results in a set of <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet> objects.
trans-unit.target: Evaluering av alle authorization-policyer i et authorization manager-resulterer i et sett med <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet>objekter.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet>

trans-unit.source: These objects make up an authorization context.
trans-unit.target: Disse objektene som utgjør en godkjenningskonteksten.

trans-unit.source: An authorization context contains a set of claim set objects, an expiration time that specifies the span of time during which the authorization context is valid, and a unique identifier.
trans-unit.target: En godkjenningskonteksten inneholder et sett med kravet sett objekter, en utløpsdato som angir tidsintervallet som godkjenningskonteksten er gyldig, og en unik identifikator.

trans-unit.source: The AuthorizationContext for the current operation can be accessed via the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceSecurityContext.AuthorizationContext%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: AuthorizationContext for den gjeldende operasjonen kan åpnes den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceSecurityContext.AuthorizationContext%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceSecurityContext.AuthorizationContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The default constructor does nothing.
trans-unit.target: Standardkonstruktøren gjøre noe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the set of claims associated with an authorization policy.
trans-unit.target: Henter settet med krav som er knyttet til en policy for godkjenning.

trans-unit.source: Use the ClaimSets property to get the set of claims that were added by the authorization policy.
trans-unit.target: Bruk egenskapen ClaimSets til å hente settet med krav som ble lagt til av policy for godkjenning.

trans-unit.source: A class deriving from <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager> can use the claims to make authorization decisions.
trans-unit.target: En klasse som er avledet fra <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager>kan bruke krav til å ta godkjenning avgjørelsene.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet"></xref> that contains the set of claims.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> av typen <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet"> </xref> som inneholder et krav.

trans-unit.source: Evaluate all of the specified authorization policies and create an <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Evaluere alle de angitte authorization-policyene og opprette en <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The CreateDefaultAuthorizationContext method is typically only used by the infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreateDefaultAuthorizationContext brukes vanligvis bare av infrastrukturen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy"></xref> that contains the set of authorization policies.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> av <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy"> </xref> som inneholder settet med godkjenning policyer.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext"></xref> that contains the result of evaluating all the specified authorization policies.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext"> </xref> som inneholder et resultat av evaluering av alle angitte authorization-policyer.

trans-unit.source: Gets the date and time at which this <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext"></xref> object is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: Henter datoen og klokkeslettet for som <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext"> </xref> objektet er ikke lenger gyldig.

trans-unit.source: The ExpirationTime property is in Universal Coordinated Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ExpirationTime er i Universal Coordinated Time (UTC).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The service model in [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] does not check the value of the ExpirationTime property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Service-modellen i [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] kontrollerer ikke verdien for egenskapen ExpirationTime.

trans-unit.source: This property is set by [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] using the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.ValidTo%2A> property of the security token on which the authorization context is based.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er angitt av [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] ved hjelp av den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.ValidTo%2A>for sikkerhetstokenet som godkjenningskonteksten er basert på.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.ValidTo%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.ValidTo%2A> property is checked by [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], however.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.ValidTo%2A>egenskapen er merket av [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], men.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.ValidTo%2A>

trans-unit.source: The authorization context's expiration time is meant for scenarios such as an authorization policy which has to take some action upon expiration.
trans-unit.target: Tidspunktet for utløp for den godkjenningskonteksten er ment for scenarier som en policy for godkjenning som har utfører en handling når det utløper.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> value that indicates the date and time when this <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext"></xref> object is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.DateTime>verdi som angir dato og klokkeslett når dette <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext"> </xref> objektet er ikke lenger gyldig.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Gets a unique identifier for this <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter en unik identifikator for denne <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the Id property is a GUID.
trans-unit.target: Id-egenskapen er vanligvis en GUID.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of non-claim properties associated with this <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av ikke-krav egenskaper som er knyttet til dette <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/add/includes/vsindigo-md.md)] reserves two properties: `Identities` and `Principal`.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/add/includes/vsindigo-md.md)]reservert to egenskaper: `Identities` og `Principal`.

trans-unit.source: The `Identities` property is used by an <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy> to specify the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> of one or more identities that are related to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext>.
trans-unit.target: Den `Identities` egenskapen brukes av en <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy>til å angi den <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>av én eller flere identiteter som er knyttet til <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy>

trans-unit.source: The `Principal` property is used by an <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy> to specify the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> that is associated with an <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext>.
trans-unit.target: Den `Principal` egenskapen brukes av en <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy>til å angi <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>som er knyttet til en <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext> </xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary%602> that specifies a collection of non-claim properties.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary%602> som angir en samling av ikke-krav egenskaper.
